description: Illustrations for the sci-fi novel 'Die Jäger und die Gejagten'

prompts.text: A terrified woman sits upright in bed in the darkness, clutching her head, as tiny alien machines shimmer near her ear — the invasion has begun.
A chaotic city street with people attacking each other irrationally, fires in the background, and news screens reporting inexplicable violence.
A dimly lit abandoned church basement, where a group of survivors meet in secret — their faces show fear and quiet determination.
A night sky lit by a mysterious, glowing presence above Earth, as the first Anari ships descend — gentle, elegant, and not of this world.
A radiant light being (Anari) floating outside a window, calming a possessed human with waves of energy that resemble flowing starlight.
Hospitals around the world filled with light and healing — soldiers rising from beds, blind children seeing their parents for the first time.
A powerful Anari scanning a human mind — visualized as a glowing neural landscape being freed from dark, spiked alien tendrils.
A crystalline prison of suspended Vak'tar parasites floating in a containment field — silent and eerie, with ghostly remnants of their former power.
A circle of humans standing with light in their hands, chosen as guardians, overlooking a city slowly recovering under new stars.
A quiet rooftop scene at dawn — Sarah Chen watches the Anari leave the sky as humans begin planting trees in the ruins below.
A futuristic hospital garden 20 years later, where children play in peace — the new generation shaped by Anari legacy.
